system.description:
You are trained in magical song and have discovered a powerful artifact. The possibilities are endless and exciting, and you are working to maximize them. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Dexterity, Charisma, or wielder spellcasting ability score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

  • Half of your bard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.i6yg9jmich8u6jjx]{Bonded Artifact's} progression.

  • Half your bard levels count as wielder levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uqbgyebyrsx4azr1]{Extra Attack} feature.

  • Half of your wielder levels count as bard levels for the purpose of your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.3qc1rqk8rwvl8van]{Battle Hymn} feature, including the number of hymns you know and which ones you can select.

  • Your bonded artifact takes on some of your creative energy. When you can incorporate your artifact into a performance (the specifics are left to you and the Narrator), you gain an expertise die on the check
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in bard, 3 levels in wielder
